1.title: Chicken wings
1.content: Put some wings in an oven and bake them.

2.title: Checkine wings buffalo
2.content: Bake wings in an oven and then add some chicken parmezan to them. Add any hot sauce.

3.title: Checkine wings buffalo
3.content: Put some wings in an oven and bake them. Dont forget to turn off the oven in 40 minutes.

1.title: Stew
1.content: Take some beef and vegies and stew for an hour.

2.title: Stew with mushrooms
2.content: Take some beef and vegies and stew for an hour. Then add some mushrooms and stew for another 20 minutes

3.title: Stew
3.content: Take some beef and vegies and stew for an hour.

1.title: Baked potatoes
1.content:
Take some middle-sized potatoes. Spread spices and salt all over them. Wrap the potatoes in foil.
Put tatoes into an oven and bake under 400 for 40 minutes.

2.title: Baked potatoes
2.content:
Take some middle-sized potatoes. Spread spices and salt all over them. Wrap the potatoes in foil.
Put tatoes into an oven and bake under 400 for 35 minutes.

3.title: Baked potatoes
3.content:
Take some middle-sized potatoes. Spread spices and salt all over them. Wrap the potatoes in foil.
Put tatoes into an oven and bake under 400 for 25 minutes.

1.title: Soup
1.content: Take chicken, vegies, water and spices + salt. Throw it all into a pot and boil for 1 hour. Then better don't eat that...

2.title: Soup
2.content: Take chicken, vegies, water and spices + salt. Throw it all into a pot and boil for 1 hour. Then eat all of it in one sitting.

3.title: Soup
3.content: Take chicken, vegies, water and spices + salt. Throw it all into a pot and boil for 1 hour. You can also add some bay leaf for extra smell. Then eat all of it in one sitting.
